name: Fabio Miranda
bio: I have obtained my Ph.D. from NYU in 2018, advised by Prof. Claudio T. Silva. In conjunction with my Ph.D., I have completed internships at Argonne National Lab, IBM Research, AT&T Labs Research, and Sandia National Labs. I have a M.Sc. from PUC-Rio, advised by Prof. Waldemar Celes. During my master studies, I worked as a researcher and software engineer developing visualization tools for the oil industry.
I am currently interested in understanding how cities change over time and space, through the use of visualization, computer graphics and data analysis.
